Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is partially covered with a yellow-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394238) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394238)
